byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: But the outsize returns that have driven shareholder activism are due for a slowdown, said Greg Weinberger, Credit Suisse’s co-head of global mergers.

headline.main: Senior Banker Predicts Robust Deal-Making Will Continue
headline.print_headline: Senior Banker Predicts Robust Deal-Making Will Continue

snippet: But the outsize returns that have driven shareholder activism are due for a slowdown, said Greg Weinberger, Credit Suisse’s co-head of global mergers.
